metadata.title: Wednesday, 28th February, 2018
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE TWELFTH ASSEMBLY

questions.section: ORDINARY QUESTIONS FOR ORAL ANSWER (STANDING ORDER NO. 30)
parts: (a) how many constituencies were not paid the 2017 Constituency Development Fund (CDF) in full;
(b) when the outstanding amount will be disbursed to all the affected constituencies;
(c) when the process of approving the 2017 CDF Projects will be completed; and
(d) when the 2018 CDF will be disbursed.

questions.section: ORDINARY QUESTIONS FOR ORAL ANSWER (STANDING ORDER NO. 30)
parts: (a) when the second phase of upgrading the Chimtende and Matunga Primary Schools in Mkaika Parliamentary Constituency will commence; and
(b) what the time-frame for completing the projects is.

questions.section: ORDINARY QUESTIONS FOR ORAL ANSWER (STANDING ORDER NO. 30)
parts: (a) when the Government will gazette the Luangwa District Hospital; and
(b) what has caused the delay in gazetting the Hospital.

questions.section: ORDINARY QUESTIONS FOR ORAL ANSWER (STANDING ORDER NO. 30)
parts: (a) whether there are any plans to conduct a delimitation exercise in Mwinilunga Parliamentary Constituency; and
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented.
